content: onto n3 pick up 1 extra stitch at the corner of the instep to eliminate having a small gap in the corner you should now have a total of 31 37 41 stitches on n3 continue knitting the k3 p1 rib pattern like you did for the leg of the sock across n1 and n2 remember this is the front of the sock or the instep now you will need the extra needle that you put aside using this needle pick up 1 stitch in the corner of the instep and then pick up 14 16 18 stitches along the other edge of the heel flap continue knitting 8 10 11 stitches to the marker from old n3 now n4 remove marker this is now n3 using a separate needle knit across n4 3 © the kitchen sink shop you should now have the following number of stitches on each needle n1 14 16 18 n2 14 16 18 n3 23 27 30 n4 23 27 30 heel decrease round 1 continue with the k3 p1 pattern on n1 and n2 instep needles for n3 k1 ssk k to end that is to say continue with stockinette on n3 and n4 for n4 k to 3 stitches from the end k2tog k1 round 2 continue with k3 p1 pattern on n1 and n2 instep needles knit all stitches on n3 and n4 repeat rounds 1 and 2 to decrease the gusset until you have a total of 56 64 72 stitches or 14 16 18 stitches on each of your 4 needles then continue knitting n1 and n2 in the k3 p1 pattern and n3 and n4 in stockinette until the foot of the sock measures approx 1 5 inches 3 5 cm shorter than your desired foot length from back of your heel to end of your big toe toe decrease round 1 n1 k1 ssk k to end n2 k to 3 stitches before end k2tog k1 n3 k1 ssk k to end n4 k to 3 stitches before end k2tog k1 round 2 k across all stitches n1-n4 repeats rounds 1 and 2 above until only 7 8 9 stitches remain on each needle total 28 32 36 stitches distribute evenly on 2 needles with your tapestry needle close the toe using the kitchener stitch or 3 needle bind off technique weave in ends soak and block if desired congratulations you re done now you re ready to go ahead with sock two abbreviations k knit p purl n - needle ssk slip 1 stitch knit wise onto right needle slip another stitch knit wise onto right needle then knit the two stitches together k2tog knit 2 stitches together as one stitch 4 © the kitchen sink shop p2tog purl 2 stitches together as one stitch s1 purl wise - slip one stitch purl wise with yarn held in front rs right side of work ws wrong side of work questions email me at thekitchensinkshop@gmail com i
